pr_title: [risk=low][RW-4857] Always display billing account dropdown in Create/Edit Workspace, and other logic changes

timeline.message: Can always view Free Credits balance, even when expired

Only show Create Billing Account when billing upgrade is true
Always fetch billing accounts
Always show account dropdown
Only select free tier account when present
Disable dropdown when billing upgrade is false and free tier is expired

timeline.bodyText: I would really like to move listBillingAccounts() and these 2 dependencies to a new BillingAccountService, but I found that doing so obscured the intent of these changes.  I'll probably file a followup PR for that.
